# llama-github [Detail Document] https://deepwiki.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github [![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/llama-github.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/llama-github) [![Downloads](https://static.pepy.tech/badge/Llama-github)](https://pepy.tech/project/Llama-github) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Apache%202.0-blue.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/Apache-2.0) Llama-github is a powerful tool that helps you retrieve(based on Agentic RAG) the most relevant code snippets, issues, and repository information from GitHub based on your queries, transforming them into valuable knowledge context. It empowers LLM Chatbots, AI Agents, and Auto-dev Agents to solve complex coding tasks. Whether you're a developer looking for quick solutions or an engineer implementing advanced Auto Dev AI Agents, llama-github makes it easy and efficient. If you like this project or believe it has potential, please give it a ‚≠êÔ∏è. Your support is our greatest motivation! ## Architecture ![High Level Architecture](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github/main/./docs/high_level_architecture.drawio.svg) ## Installation

# llama-github [Szczeg√≥≈Çowy dokument] https://deepwiki.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github [![Wersja PyPI](https://badge.fury.io/py/llama-github.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/llama-github) [![Pobrania](https://static.pepy.tech/badge/Llama-github)](https://pepy.tech/project/Llama-github) [![Licencja](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Apache%202.0-blue.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/Apache-2.0) Llama-github to potƒô≈ºne narzƒôdzie, kt√≥re pomaga wyszukiwaƒá (w oparciu o Agentic RAG) najbardziej istotne fragmenty kodu, zg≈Çoszenia i informacje o repozytorium z GitHub na podstawie Twoich zapyta≈Ñ, przekszta≈ÇcajƒÖc je w warto≈õciowy kontekst wiedzy. Narzƒôdzie to umo≈ºliwia chatbotom LLM, agentom AI oraz Auto-dev Agentom rozwiƒÖzywanie z≈Ço≈ºonych zada≈Ñ programistycznych. Je≈õli podoba Ci siƒô ten projekt lub uwa≈ºasz, ≈ºe ma on potencja≈Ç, prosimy o zostawienie ‚≠êÔ∏è. Twoje wsparcie jest dla nas najwiƒôkszƒÖ motywacjƒÖ! ## Architektura ![Architektura wysokiego poziomu](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github/main/./docs/high_level_architecture.drawio.svg) ## Instalacja

## Usage

Here's a simple example of how to use llama-github:
Translation:
## U≈ºytkowanie

Oto prosty przyk≈Çad, jak u≈ºywaƒá llama-github:

RowTranslations.originContent: Here's a simple example of how to use llama-github:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Oto prosty przyk≈Çad, jak u≈ºywaƒá llama-github:

Content:
```python
from llama_github import GithubRAG

# Initialize GithubRAG with your credentials
github_rag = GithubRAG(
    github_access_token="your_github_access_token", 
    openai_api_key="your_openai_api_key", # Optional in Simple Mode
    jina_api_key="your_jina_api_key" # Optional - unless you want high concurrency production deployment (s.jina.ai API will be used in llama-github)
)

# Retrieve context for a coding question (simple_mode is default set to False)
query = "How to create a NumPy array in Python?"
context = github_rag.retrieve_context(
    query, # In professional mode, one query will take nearly 1 min to generate final contexts. You could set log level to INFO to monitor the retrieval progress
    # simple_mode = True
)

print(context)
```
Translation:
```python
from llama_github import GithubRAG

# Initialize GithubRAG with your credentials
github_rag = GithubRAG(
    github_access_token="your_github_access_token", 
    openai_api_key="your_openai_api_key", # Optional in Simple Mode
    jina_api_key="your_jina_api_key" # Optional - unless you want high concurrency production deployment (s.jina.ai API will be used in llama-github)
)

# Retrieve context for a coding question (simple_mode is default set to False)
query = "How to create a NumPy array in Python?"
context = github_rag.retrieve_context(
    query, # In professional mode, one query will take nearly 1 min to generate final contexts. You could set log level to INFO to monitor the retrieval progress
    # simple_mode = True
)

print(context)
```

Content:
For more advanced usage and examples, please refer to the [documentation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github/main/docs/usage.md).

## Key Features

- **üîç Intelligent GitHub Retrieval**: Harness the power of llama-github to retrieve highly relevant code snippets, issues, and repository information from GitHub based on user queries. Our advanced retrieval techniques ensure you find the most pertinent information quickly and efficiently.

- **‚ö° Repository Pool Caching**: Llama-github has an innovative repository pool caching mechanism. By caching repositories (including READMEs, structures, code, and issues) across threads, llama-github significantly accelerates GitHub search retrieval efficiency and minimizes the consumption of GitHub API tokens. Deploy llama-github in multi-threaded production environments with confidence, knowing that it will perform optimally and save you valuable resources.

- **üß† LLM-Powered Question Analysis**: Leverage state-of-the-art language models to analyze user questions and generate highly effective search strategies and criteria. Llama-github intelligently breaks down complex queries, ensuring that you retrieve the most relevant information from GitHub's vast repository network.

- **üìö Comprehensive Context Generation**: Generate rich, contextually relevant answers by seamlessly combining information retrieved from GitHub with the reasoning capabilities of advanced language models. Llama-github excels at handling even the most complex and lengthy questions, providing comprehensive and insightful responses that include extensive context to support your development needs.

- **üöÄ Asynchronous Processing Excellence**: Llama-github is built from the ground up to leverage the full potential of asynchronous programming. With meticulously implemented asynchronous mechanisms woven throughout the codebase, llama-github can handle multiple requests concurrently, significantly boosting overall performance. Experience the difference as llama-github efficiently manages high-volume workloads without compromising on speed or quality.

- **üîß Flexible LLM Integration**: Easily integrate llama-github with various LLM providers, embedding models, and reranking models to tailor the library's capabilities to your specific requirements. Our extensible architecture allows you to customize and enhance llama-github's functionality, ensuring that it adapts seamlessly to your unique development environment.

- **üîí Robust Authentication Options**: Llama-github supports both personal access tokens and GitHub App authentication, providing you with the flexibility to integrate it into different development setups. Whether you're an individual developer or working within an organizational context, llama-github has you covered with secure and reliable authentication mechanisms.

- **üõ†Ô∏è Logging and Error Handling**: We understand the importance of smooth operations and easy troubleshooting. That's why llama-github comes equipped with comprehensive logging and error handling mechanisms. Gain deep insights into the library's behavior, quickly diagnose issues, and maintain a stable and reliable development workflow.

## ü§ñ Try Our AI-Powered PR Review Assistant: LlamaPReview

If you find llama-github useful, you might also be interested in our AI-powered GitHub PR review assistant, LlamaPReview. It's designed to complement your development workflow and further enhance code quality.

### Key Features of LlamaPReview:
- üöÄ One-click installation, zero configuration required, fully auto-run
- üíØ Currently free to use - no credit card or payment info needed
- üß† AI-powered, automatic PR reviews with deep code understanding
- üåê Supports multiple programming languages

**LlamaPReview utilizes llama-github's advanced context retrieval and LLM-powered analysis** to provide intelligent, context-aware code reviews. It's like having a senior developer, armed with the full context of your repository, review every PR automatically!

üëâ [Install LlamaPReview Now](https://github.com/marketplace/llamapreview/) (Free)

By using llama-github for context retrieval and LlamaPReview for code reviews, you can create a powerful, AI-enhanced development environment.

## Vision and Roadmap

### Vision

Our vision is to become a pivotal module in the future of AI-driven development solutions, seamlessly integrating with GitHub to empower LLMs in automatically resolving complex coding tasks.

![Vision Architecture](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github/main/./docs/vision.drawio.svg)

### Roadmap

For a detailed view of our project roadmap, please visit our [Project Roadmap](https://github.com/users/JetXu-LLM/projects/2).

## Acknowledgments

We would like to express our gratitude to the following open-source projects for their support and contributions:

- **[LangChain](https://github.com/langchain-ai/langchain)**: For providing the foundational framework that empowers the LLM prompting and processing capabilities in llama-github.
- **[Jina.ai](https://github.com/jina-ai/reader)**: For offering s.jina.ai API and open source reranker and embedding models that enhance the accuracy and relevance of the generated contexts in llama-github.

Their contributions have been instrumental in the development of llama-github, and we highly recommend checking out their projects for more innovative solutions.

## Contributing

We welcome contributions to llama-github! Please see our [contributing guidelines](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) for more information.

## License

This project is licensed under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license. See the [LICENSE](LICENSE) file for more details.

## Contact

If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback, please feel free to reach out to us at [Jet Xu's email](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github/main/mailto:Voldemort.xu@foxmail.com).

---

Thank you for choosing llama-github! We hope this library enhances your AI development experience and helps you build powerful applications with ease.

Aby uzyskaƒá bardziej zaawansowane przyk≈Çady u≈ºycia, zapoznaj siƒô z [dokumentacjƒÖ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github/main/docs/usage.md).

## Kluczowe funkcje

- **üîç Inteligentne pobieranie z GitHub**: Wykorzystaj moc llama-github do pobierania najbardziej trafnych fragment√≥w kodu, zg≈Çosze≈Ñ i informacji o repozytoriach z GitHub na podstawie zapyta≈Ñ u≈ºytkownika. Nasze zaawansowane techniki wyszukiwania zapewniajƒÖ szybkie i skuteczne znajdowanie najwa≈ºniejszych informacji.

- **‚ö° Pamiƒôƒá podrƒôczna puli repozytori√≥w**: Llama-github posiada innowacyjny mechanizm pamiƒôci podrƒôcznej puli repozytori√≥w. Dziƒôki buforowaniu repozytori√≥w (w tym plik√≥w README, struktury, kodu i zg≈Çosze≈Ñ) miƒôdzy wƒÖtkami, llama-github znacznie przyspiesza wydajno≈õƒá wyszukiwania na GitHub i minimalizuje zu≈ºycie token√≥w API GitHub. Wdra≈ºaj llama-github w ≈õrodowiskach wielowƒÖtkowych bez obaw o wydajno≈õƒá i oszczƒôdno≈õƒá zasob√≥w.

- **üß† Analiza pyta≈Ñ oparta na LLM**: Skorzystaj z najnowocze≈õniejszych modeli jƒôzykowych do analizy pyta≈Ñ u≈ºytkownik√≥w oraz generowania skutecznych strategii i kryteri√≥w wyszukiwania. Llama-github inteligentnie rozk≈Çada z≈Ço≈ºone zapytania, zapewniajƒÖc dostƒôp do najbardziej trafnych informacji z ogromnej sieci repozytori√≥w GitHub.

- **üìö Kompleksowe generowanie kontekstu**: Generuj bogate, kontekstowo trafne odpowiedzi, p≈Çynnie ≈ÇƒÖczƒÖc informacje pobrane z GitHub z mo≈ºliwo≈õciami rozumowania zaawansowanych modeli jƒôzykowych. Llama-github doskonale radzi sobie nawet z najbardziej z≈Ço≈ºonymi i d≈Çugimi pytaniami, dostarczajƒÖc szczeg√≥≈Çowych odpowiedzi wraz z szerokim kontekstem wspierajƒÖcym Twoje potrzeby programistyczne.

- **üöÄ Doskona≈Ço≈õƒá przetwarzania asynchronicznego**: Llama-github zosta≈Ç stworzony od podstaw, aby w pe≈Çni wykorzystaƒá potencja≈Ç programowania asynchronicznego. Dziƒôki starannie zaimplementowanym mechanizmom asynchronicznym w ca≈Çej bazie kodu, llama-github obs≈Çuguje wiele ≈ºƒÖda≈Ñ jednocze≈õnie, znaczƒÖco zwiƒôkszajƒÖc wydajno≈õƒá. Przekonaj siƒô, jak efektywnie zarzƒÖdza du≈ºym obciƒÖ≈ºeniem bez utraty szybko≈õci i jako≈õci.

- **üîß Elastyczna integracja z LLM**: ≈Åatwo integruj llama-github z r√≥≈ºnymi dostawcami LLM, modelami embedding i reranking, dostosowujƒÖc mo≈ºliwo≈õci biblioteki do w≈Çasnych wymaga≈Ñ. Nasza rozszerzalna architektura pozwala na personalizacjƒô i rozbudowƒô funkcjonalno≈õci llama-github, dziƒôki czemu p≈Çynnie dopasuje siƒô do Twojego ≈õrodowiska deweloperskiego.

- **üîí Solidne opcje uwierzytelniania**: Llama-github obs≈Çuguje zar√≥wno tokeny dostƒôpu osobistego, jak i uwierzytelnianie za pomocƒÖ GitHub App, dajƒÖc elastyczno≈õƒá integracji w r√≥≈ºnych ≈õrodowiskach programistycznych. Niezale≈ºnie od tego, czy jeste≈õ indywidualnym deweloperem, czy pracujesz w organizacji, llama-github zapewnia bezpieczne i niezawodne mechanizmy uwierzytelniania.

- **üõ†Ô∏è Logowanie i obs≈Çuga b≈Çƒôd√≥w**: Rozumiemy, jak wa≈ºna jest p≈Çynna obs≈Çuga i ≈Çatwe rozwiƒÖzywanie problem√≥w. Dlatego llama-github wyposa≈ºony jest w kompleksowy system logowania i obs≈Çugi b≈Çƒôd√≥w. Uzyskaj wglƒÖd w dzia≈Çanie biblioteki, szybko diagnozuj problemy i utrzymuj stabilny oraz niezawodny workflow deweloperski.

## ü§ñ Wypr√≥buj naszego AI-asystenta do przeglƒÖdu PR: LlamaPReview

Je≈õli uwa≈ºasz, ≈ºe llama-github jest przydatny, mo≈ºe zainteresuje Ciƒô tak≈ºe nasz AI-asystent do przeglƒÖdu PR na GitHub, LlamaPReview. Zosta≈Ç zaprojektowany, by uzupe≈Çniƒá Tw√≥j workflow programistyczny i dodatkowo poprawiƒá jako≈õƒá kodu.

### Kluczowe funkcje LlamaPReview:
- üöÄ Instalacja jednym klikniƒôciem, zero konfiguracji, pe≈Çna automatyzacja
- üíØ Obecnie darmowy - nie wymaga karty ani p≈Çatno≈õci
- üß† Automatyczne, AI-napƒôdzane przeglƒÖdy PR z g≈Çƒôbokim zrozumieniem kodu
- üåê Obs≈Çuga wielu jƒôzyk√≥w programowania

**LlamaPReview wykorzystuje zaawansowane pobieranie kontekstu oraz analizƒô LLM z llama-github**, by zapewniƒá inteligentne, kontekstowe przeglƒÖdy kodu. To jakby≈õ mia≈Ç starszego programistƒô, kt√≥ry zna ca≈Çy kontekst repozytorium i automatycznie przeglƒÖda ka≈ºdy PR!

üëâ [Zainstaluj LlamaPReview teraz](https://github.com/marketplace/llamapreview/) (Darmowe)

KorzystajƒÖc z llama-github do pobierania kontekstu i LlamaPReview do przeglƒÖd√≥w kodu, tworzysz potƒô≈ºne, AI-wspierane ≈õrodowisko deweloperskie.

## Wizja i plan rozwoju

### Wizja

NaszƒÖ wizjƒÖ jest staƒá siƒô kluczowym modu≈Çem w przysz≈Ço≈õci rozwiƒÖza≈Ñ opartych na AI, integrujƒÖcym siƒô z GitHub w celu umo≈ºliwienia LLM automatycznego rozwiƒÖzywania z≈Ço≈ºonych zada≈Ñ programistycznych.

![Architektura wizji](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github/main/./docs/vision.drawio.svg)

### Plan rozwoju

Aby zobaczyƒá szczeg√≥≈Çowy plan rozwoju projektu, odwied≈∫ nasz [Project Roadmap](https://github.com/users/JetXu-LLM/projects/2).

## Podziƒôkowania

Chcieliby≈õmy podziƒôkowaƒá nastƒôpujƒÖcym projektom open-source za ich wsparcie i wk≈Çad:

- **[LangChain](https://github.com/langchain-ai/langchain)**: Za dostarczenie podstawowego frameworka, kt√≥ry umo≈ºliwia wywo≈Çywanie i przetwarzanie LLM w llama-github.
- **[Jina.ai](https://github.com/jina-ai/reader)**: Za udostƒôpnienie API s.jina.ai oraz otwarto≈∫r√≥d≈Çowych modeli rerankera i embedding, kt√≥re zwiƒôkszajƒÖ trafno≈õƒá i dok≈Çadno≈õƒá generowanych kontekst√≥w w llama-github.

Ich wk≈Çad by≈Ç kluczowy dla rozwoju llama-github i gorƒÖco polecamy ich projekty, je≈õli szukasz innowacyjnych rozwiƒÖza≈Ñ.

## Wk≈Çad w projekt

Zachƒôcamy do wsp√≥≈Çtworzenia llama-github! Zapoznaj siƒô z [wytycznymi dla kontrybutor√≥w](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github/main/CONTRIBUTING.md), by dowiedzieƒá siƒô wiƒôcej.

## Licencja

Ten projekt jest licencjonowany na zasadach licencji Apache 2.0. Szczeg√≥≈Çy znajdziesz w pliku [LICENSE](LICENSE).

## Kontakt

W razie pyta≈Ñ, sugestii lub opinii, skontaktuj siƒô z nami na [e-mail Jet Xu](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JetXu-LLM/llama-github/main/mailto:Voldemort.xu@foxmail.com).

RowTranslations.originContent: - **üß† LLM-Powered Question Analysis**: Leverage state-of-the-art language models to analyze user questions and generate highly effective search strategies and criteria. Llama-github intelligently breaks down complex queries, ensuring that you retrieve the most relevant information from GitHub's vast repository network.

Llama-github inteligentnie rozk≈Çada z≈Ço≈ºone zapytania, zapewniajƒÖc dostƒôp do najbardziej trafnych informacji z ogromnej sieci repozytori√≥w GitHub.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **üìö Comprehensive Context Generation**: Generate rich, contextually relevant answers by seamlessly combining information retrieved from GitHub with the reasoning capabilities of advanced language models. Llama-github excels at handling even the most complex and lengthy questions, providing comprehensive and insightful responses that include extensive context to support your development needs.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **üöÄ Asynchronous Processing Excellence**: Llama-github is built from the ground up to leverage the full potential of asynchronous programming. With meticulously implemented asynchronous mechanisms woven throughout the codebase, llama-github can handle multiple requests concurrently, significantly boosting overall performance. Experience the difference as llama-github efficiently manages high-volume workloads without compromising on speed or quality.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **üîß Flexible LLM Integration**: Easily integrate llama-github with various LLM providers, embedding models, and reranking models to tailor the library's capabilities to your specific requirements. RowTranslations.originContent: - **üîí Robust Authentication Options**: Llama-github supports both personal access tokens and GitHub App authentication, providing you with the flexibility to integrate it into different development setups. Whether you're an individual developer or working within an organizational context, llama-github has you covered with secure and reliable authentication mechanisms.

RowTranslations.originContent: ## ü§ñ Try Our AI-Powered PR Review Assistant: LlamaPReview
